item.title: Productive
item.description: Courtesy of Google Search Trends Lets talk about this time-series whose trend is as predictable as the S&P 500. Whatever it is, it has been consistently trending upwards and chances are, that won’t change anytime soon. What you’re looking at is global interest in the word productive for as long as we’ve had data. Turns out productivity is top of mind whether we are in a recession or a global pandemic.
